wordGroup: tubular pile 管桩，管柱；管套桩
tubular goods 管类材料；圆筒织物

sentences.en: The long, tubular membranes of nerve cells carry electrical impulses.
sentences.cn: 神经细胞的长管状膜携带电脉冲。

sentences.en: An included SoundFont focusing on hammered instruments (tubular bells, piano, xylophone) is included with the downloads.
sentences.cn: 下载的部分包括专用于打击乐器（管钟、钢琴、木琴）的内置 SoundFont。

sentences.en: Myoglobinuria may result in renal tubular necrosis if untreated.
sentences.cn: 如果不进行治疗，肌红蛋白尿就可能造成肾小管坏死。
